content.question: Which of the following is a correct expression for <math alttext="v sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="The square root of g h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of v sub i squared plus 2 g h, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>i</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msubsup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction lowercase m over lowercase m plus upper case M, end fraction, times v sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>M</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>i</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction lowercase m over uppercase M, end fraction, times v sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>i</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction uppercase M over lowercase m, end fraction, times v sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>i</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction lowercase m over lowercase m plus upper case M, end fraction, times v sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>M</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>i</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
